{{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2500U |revision=/BRU/C C1 |availability=common |type=dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6332 |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=NXW25P16 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Etron |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num=1 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial=points on board |jtag= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:21:91 }}'''D-Link DSL-2500U/BRU/C rev. C1''' - ADSL/ADSL2/ADSL2+ modem (router/bridge). D-Link Part number: RSL2500UEBRU9C1 (with firmware ver. RU_1.00). File:DSL-2500U BRU D Front.jpg|Front view File:DSL-2500U front panel.jpg|Front panel File:DSL-2500U back panel.jpg|Rear panel The processor is part BCM6332KFBG. Some people report about serial flash chip Winbond W25Y16VSIG. (See [http://adslhw.pskov.ru/ ADSL Hardware] Â© [mailto:fregl@inbox.ru Fregl].)
On board presents unidentified chip "Grouptek HST-1601DR", DIP16. (Look message at 18 Mar 2012 17:48:22 with MSGID "2:461/155 4f6621e9" from Alexey Korop 2:461/155@fidonet to Ilya Yanok, with subject "DNS" in echoconference ru.linux.chainik.) == See also == * [ftp://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/ADSL/DSL-2500U_BRU_C/Description/DSL-2500U_C1_Manual_1.00.pdf PDF] User manual * [ftp://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/ADSL/DSL-2500U_BRU_C/ DSL-2500U/BRU/C] directory on D-link FTP archive. * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2500u DSL-2500U] in OpenVRT Wiki * [http://chairday.narod.ru/DSL-2500U.html Reconnect PPPoE on modem DSL-2500U] (russian). [[Has images::external| ]]
